Articles.Content: I'm having trouble applying the 1.4.x to 1.4.5 patch to my Win64 install of KSP.  When I run it and point it to the install directory it fails saying "Please select a valid Kerbal Space Program folder".  I've still got the 1.4.x to 1.4.3 patch and it recognises the directory and tells me that KSP is already patched to 1.4.3 so I think the directory is valid.  Any suggestions would be appreciated...
If you have steam try veryfing file integrety

Thanks for the advice.  I'm actually not using Steam for KSP.  I've been playing since 2013 and through inertia I've just kept on with the KSP site. 

Anyway, I went back to the KSP store and re-downloaded - the install worked correctly this time.  Very strange - I don't think I've ever seen an installer corrupted by a download actually start to function...
